languages.text: "Ты слишком впечатлительна для той, у кого в голове дыра в варп. Или ты просто безумная? В твоей болтовне можно ногу сломать".
languages.translation_comment:
After Tarzus attempted to arrest Pasqal.
Idira: "The whole story surrounding our new Enginseer Prime makes me antsy... It's like a huge machine has been set into motion, and it can't wait to fit all its parts together."

languages.text: "You are far too impressionable for someone who has a hole into the warp inside her skull. Or are you simply insane? Trying to make sense of your chatter is giving me a headache."
languages.translation_comment:
After Tarzus attempted to arrest Pasqal.
Idira: "The whole story surrounding our new Enginseer Prime makes me antsy... It's like a huge machine has been set into motion, and it can't wait to fit all its parts together."
languages.original_text: "Ты слишком впечатлительна для той, у кого в голове дыра в варп. Или ты просто безумная? В твоей болтовне можно ногу сломать".

"You are far too impressionable for someone who has a hole into the warp inside her skull. Or are you simply insane? Trying to make sense of your chatter is giving me a headache."

languages.text: 「頭蓋骨の中に〈歪み〉の穴があるくせに、お前はあまりにも影響されやすいな。それとも単に頭がおかしいのか？お前のお喋りを理解しようとすると頭が痛くなる」
languages.original_text: "You are far too impressionable for someone who has a hole into the warp inside her skull. Or are you simply insane? Trying to make sense of your chatter is giving me a headache."

traits.locale_text: 「頭蓋骨の中に〈歪み〉の穴があるくせに、お前はあまりにも影響されやすいな。それとも単に頭がおかしいのか？お前のお喋りを理解しようとすると頭が痛くなる」

languages.text: "Ihr seid viel zu leicht zu beeindrucken für jemanden, der im Schädel ein Loch in den Warp hat. Oder seid Ihr einfach nur wahnsinnig? In Eurem Geplapper einen Sinn zu erkennen, bereitet mir Kopfschmerzen."
languages.original_text: "You are far too impressionable for someone who has a hole into the warp inside her skull. Or are you simply insane? Trying to make sense of your chatter is giving me a headache."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid viel zu leicht zu beeindrucken für jemanden, der im Schädel ein Loch in den Warp hat. Oder seid Ihr einfach nur wahnsinnig? In Eurem Geplapper einen Sinn zu erkennen, bereitet mir Kopfschmerzen."

languages.text: «Para tener un agujero que conduce a la disformidad en la cabeza, es demasiado sensible. ¿O es que ha perdido la cabeza? Intentar comprender su cotorreo hace que me duela la cabeza».
languages.original_text: "You are far too impressionable for someone who has a hole into the warp inside her skull. Or are you simply insane? Trying to make sense of your chatter is giving me a headache."

traits.locale_text: «Para tener un agujero que conduce a la disformidad en la cabeza, es demasiado sensible. ¿O es que ha perdido la cabeza? Intentar comprender su cotorreo hace que me duela la cabeza».

languages.text: “很多灵能者脑袋里都开了个连着亚空间的大洞，可你实在是太容易受到影响了。还是说，你仅仅是疯了而已？你的唠叨真让我头疼。”
languages.original_text: "You are far too impressionable for someone who has a hole into the warp inside her skull. Or are you simply insane? Trying to make sense of your chatter is giving me a headache."

traits.locale_text: “很多灵能者脑袋里都开了个连着亚空间的大洞，可你实在是太容易受到影响了。还是说，你仅仅是疯了而已？你的唠叨真让我头疼。”

languages.text: "Kafatasında öteboyuta açılan bir delik olan biri için fazlasıyla etkilenmeye açıksın. Ya da belki de düpedüz delisindir? Senin zırvalarını anlamlandırmaya çalışmaktan başıma ağrılar girdi."
languages.original_text: "You are far too impressionable for someone who has a hole into the warp inside her skull. Or are you simply insane? Trying to make sense of your chatter is giving me a headache."

traits.locale_text: "Kafatasında öteboyuta açılan bir delik olan biri için fazlasıyla etkilenmeye açıksın. Ya da belki de düpedüz delisindir? Senin zırvalarını anlamlandırmaya çalışmaktan başıma ağrılar girdi."

languages.original_text: "You are far too impressionable for someone who has a hole into the warp inside her skull. Or are you simply insane? Trying to make sense of your chatter is giving me a headache."

languages.text: « Vous êtes bien trop influençable pour quelqu'un qui a une fissure ouvrant sur le Warp dans son crâne. Ou seriez-vous tout simplement folle ? Tenter de donner un sens à ce que vous racontez me donne la migraine. »
languages.original_text: "You are far too impressionable for someone who has a hole into the warp inside her skull. Or are you simply insane? Trying to make sense of your chatter is giving me a headache."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes bien trop influençable pour quelqu'un qui a une fissure ouvrant sur le Warp dans son crâne. Ou seriez-vous tout simplement folle ? Tenter de donner un sens à ce que vous racontez me donne la migraine. »
